title: Fireside with the Underboss - "Larry Mazza Grabbed a Shotgun and Shot Him in The Face"
description: Greg Scarpa Sr., Larry Mazza and Sammy are all on a hit together; they're looking for a guy named Nicky Black. Greg is assigned to be the designated shooter, but when things go awry, Larry steps in and finishes the hit brutally.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Greg Scarpa Sr., Larry Mazza and Sammy are all on a hit together; they're looking for a guy named Nicky Black. Greg is assigned to be the designated shooter, but when things go awry, Larry steps in and finishes the hit brutally.
